pr_title: NMS-12602: Upgrade Kafka SinkMessage to Proto3

timeline.message: NMS-12602: Upgrade sink message to proto3

timeline.bodyText: Are we using system_id and location?

replies.bodyText: No. I was using the same SinkMessage as gRPC but we don't need them as of now. Will remove them
